draw_domains.f90

00002 ! ======================
00003 !
00004 !   DRAW_DOMAINS
00005 !
00006 !   Output particles and tree structure for processing
00007 !   by GLE 
00008 !
00009 ! ======================
00010 
00011 subroutine draw_domains(timestamp)
00012 
00013 
00014   use treevars
00015 
00016   implicit none
00017 
00018   integer*8 :: key_twig(ntwig), key_leaf(nleaf)
00019   integer, dimension(ntwig) :: level_twig, node_twig       ! twig-nodes
00020   integer, dimension(nleaf) :: level_leaf, plist_leaf, ind_leaf       ! leaf-nodes
00021 
00022   character(30) :: cfile
00023   character(1) :: csnap
00024   character(3) :: cme
00025   character(6) :: cvisit
00026   character(15), parameter :: colors(0:9) = (/"red           ", &
00027                                               "bright_gold   ", &
00028                                               "lime_green    ", &
00029                                               "medium_blue   ", &
00030                                               "magenta       ", &
00031                                               "brass         ", &
00032                                               "orange        ", &
00033                                               "aqua          ", &
00034                                               "violet_red    ", &
00035                                               "yellow_green  "/) 
00036 
00037 
00038   integer :: i, ip, j, ilev, isnap, ibt, ix, iy, iz, nbits
00039   real :: s, xt, yt, zt
00040   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00041   integer :: icall
00042   integer, intent(in) :: timestamp
00043 
00044 
00045   !  Header file written out by root PE: does box and includes particle O/P from all PEs
00046   if ( me==0 ) then
00047      cfile="domains.gle"
00048      write (ipefile,'(a)') cfile
00049      open(61,file=cfile)
00050 
00051 
00052      !  initialise graphics filter
00053 
00054      write (61,'(a,3(/a),2(/a,2f13.4))') &
00055           'size 18 18' &
00056           , 'set font rm' &
00057           , 'set lwidth 0.001 lstyle 1' &
00058           , 'psize=0.04' &
00059           , 'begin scale ',15./boxsize,15./boxsize &
00060           , 'begin translate ',.05*boxsize,.05*boxsize
00061 
00062 !     write (61,'(a/a,2f13.4)') 'amove 0 0','box ',boxsize,boxsize
00063 
00064      do i=0, num_pe-1
00065         cme = achar(i/100+48) // achar(mod(i/10,10)+48) // achar(mod(i,10)+48)  ! Convert 3-digit PE number into character string
00066         cfile="domain_"//cme//".gle"
00067         write (61,'(2a)') 'include ',cfile
00068      end do
00069      write (61,'(a/a)') 'end translate','end scale'
00070      close(61)
00071 
00072   endif
00073 
00074 
00075   !  Now do particles and boxes belonging to each processor domain
00076 
00077   cme = achar(me/100+48) // achar(mod(me/10,10)+48) // achar(mod(me,10)+48)  ! Convert 3-digit PE number into character string
00078   cfile="domain_"//cme//".gle"
00079   open (60,file=cfile) 
00080 
00081   ! get keys of twig nodes from hash table
00082   key_twig = pack(htable%key,mask=htable%node<0)
00083 
00084   ! get levels of twigs
00085   level_twig = log( 1.*key_twig )/log(8.)
00086   node_twig = pack(htable%node,mask=htable%node<0)         ! twig index
00087 
00088 
00089   !  write (60,'(a/a,a15)') 'set lwidth .001','set color ',colors( mod(me,10) )
00090   write (60,'(a/a)') 'set lwidth .001','set color black'
00091 
00092   do j=2,ntwig
00093      ! get coords from keys
00094      nbits = level_twig(j)
00095      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_twig(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00096      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_twig(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00097 
00098      s = boxsize/2**(level_twig(j))          !  box length
00099      xt=ix*s + xmin
00100      yt=iy*s + ymin
00101      !write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00102      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xcoc( node_twig(j) ),ycoc( node_twig(j) )        ! Centre of charge of twig node
00103      !     write (60,'(a,f10.5,a)') 'circle ',.005*sqrt(abs_charge( node_twig(j) )),' fill cyan'
00104      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.01'
00105      !     write (60,'(a,b10)') 'text ',key_twig(j)         ! write out key
00106 
00107   end do
00108 
00109 
00110   ! Branch nodes
00111 
00112   write (60,'(a)') 'set lwidth .02 color white'
00113 
00114 
00115 !  branch_owner = (/ ( htable( key2addr( branch_key(j) ) )%owner, j=1,nbranch_sum) /)         ! Owner-PE of branch
00116 
00117   do j=1,nbranch_sum
00118      ilev = log( 1.*branch_key(j) )/log(8.)
00119      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00120      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00121      iz = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( branch_key(j),3*i+2,1 ), i=0,ilev-1) /) )
00122 
00123      s = boxsize/2**(ilev)          !  box length
00124      xt=ix*s + xmin
00125      yt=iy*s + ymin
00126      zt=iz*s + zmin
00127      write (60,'(a)') 'set color white'
00128      write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00129      if (branch_owner(j) == me ) then
00130         write (60,'(a,2f13.4,a,a15)') 'box ',s,s,' fill ',colors( mod(me,10) )
00131      else
00132 !        write (60,'(a,2f13.4,a)') 'box ',s,s,' fill grey5'
00133      endif
00134 
00135      if (me==0) write (61,'(4f15.5,i6,2f15.5)') xt, yt, zt, s, branch_owner(j), s, s
00136 
00137   !     write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.01 color black'
00138   !     write (60,'(a,i5)') 'text ',branch_key(j)
00139   end do
00140 
00141   ! get keys of leaf nodes from hash table
00142   key_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%key,mask=htable%node>0)
00143   ind_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%node,mask=htable%node>0)         ! particle index
00144   plist_leaf(1:nleaf) = pack(htable%childcode,mask=htable%node>0)   ! particle label
00145 
00146   ! get levels of leaves
00147   level_leaf(1:nleaf) = log(1.*key_leaf(1:nleaf))/log(8.)
00148 
00149   write (60,'(a)') 'set lwidth .001 color black'
00150 
00151   do j=1,nleaf
00152      ! get box coords from keys
00153      nbits = level_leaf(j)    ! # bits per ordinate
00154      ix = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_leaf(j),3*i,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00155      iy = SUM( (/ (2**i*ibits( key_leaf(j),3*i+1,1 ), i=0,nbits-1) /) )
00156 
00157      s = boxsize/2**(level_leaf(j))          !  box length
00158      xt=ix*s + xmin
00159      yt=iy*s + ymin
00160      !     write (60,'(a/a)') 'set color black','set lwidth .002'
00161 !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00162      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'box ',s,s
00163      ! keys
00164      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00165      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set hei 0.01'
00166      !     write (60,'(a,b14)') 'text ',key_leaf(j)
00167 
00168 
00169 
00170   end do
00171 
00172 
00173 
00174   do i=1,npp
00175 !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',x(i),y(i)
00176      !     write (60,'(2a)') 'circle .002 fill ',colors( mod(me,8) )
00177  !    write (60,'(2a)') 'circle psize fill black'
00178   end do
00179 
00180 
00181   ! map of interleaved bits 
00182 
00183 
00184   ! first point
00185   xt=x(1)
00186   yt=y(1)
00187   !  write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'amove ',xt,yt
00188 
00189   do ip = 2,npp
00190      xt=x(ip)
00191      yt=y(ip)
00192      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',xt,yt
00193   end do
00194 
00195   !  boundary links
00196   if (me /= num_pe-1) then
00197      !     write (60,'(a)') 'set color grey50'
00198      !     write (60,'(a,2f13.4)') 'aline ',x(npp+1),y(npp+1)
00199   endif
00200 
00201 
00202 
00203   close(60)
00204   close(61)
00205 
00206 end subroutine draw_domains
